content: >http://english.aljazeera.net/focus/2009/05/200952884121514155.html Al Jezeerah echoes what a number of other sources describe as a rapidly destabilizing situation in Pakistan. Bomb and terrorist attacks in areas away from the embattled North East region are increasing, as is government repression and 'security' action.
reply: >http://english.aljazeera.net/focus/2009/05/200952884121514155.html Al Jezeerah echoes what a number of other sources describe as a rapidly destabilizing situation in Pakistan. Bomb and terrorist attacks in areas away from the embattled North East region are increasing, as is government repression and 'security' action.
title: Violence Spreads in Pakistan

content: >http://www.nytimes.com/2009/05/29/world/asia/29pstan.html?em Boom. Boom. Boom. Where's Swat? These bombings are turning 'everybody' in Pakistan against the Taliban. That's the sort of 'news' 6 billion in weapons will buy.

title: Violence Spreads in Pakistan
